channel.title: Help em firue out this anti leech plz!

item.title: Help em firue out this anti leech plz!
item.dc:creator: @r1ch_kid r1ch kid
item.description:
@r1ch_kid wrote:

Here, let me give you a tip.
There’s the apparent simple anti-leech right in front of you.
The second is deep in the code based on completing it by simple recoding.
If you can’t fix this, it will only attack the last player to log in. Big hint

for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person != null) { if(p != null && person != null) { if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) <= 20 && p.heightLevel == npcs[i].heightLevel) if (npcType == 3765) { npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId; npcs[i].RandomWalk = false; npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true; person.updateRequired = true; person.hitUpdateRequired = true; } else if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 21 || person.heightLevel != npcs[i].heightLevel) if (npcs[i].npcType == 3765) { npcs[i].RandomWalk = true; } } } }

Read full topic
item.source: Help em firue out this anti leech plz!
